meanings.definition: Of or having to do with Japan, or its people or language.

images.alt: Photo of a brightly lit street in Japan.
images.description: A street filled with brightly lit signs. Many people walk along the sidewalks on either side of the street.
images.caption: A city street in Tokyo, Japan.

source.title: People Walking on Street Near Buildings
source.author: Aleksandar Pasaric

meanings.definition: To make (an idea, situation, or problem) clear to someone by describing it in more detail or revealing relevant facts or ideas.
examples: Callie needed to explain why she was late to school.

images.alt: Photo of a person pointing to blackboard.
images.description: A person pointing to writing on a blackboard.
images.caption: When someone explains something, it should make it easier to understand.

source.title: Strict female teacher with book pointing at scribbled blackboard
source.author: Andrea Piacquadio

meanings.definition: To give food or drink to someone.
examples: They served potato chips with lunch.

images.description: A person holds out a plate of food toward the viewer.
images.caption: A person serves food in a restaurant.

source.title: Person Holding Square White Ceramic Plate
source.author: Edward Eyer

examples: The building was totally destroyed by the fire.
